channel.title: 317 Delta. Critical command problem. Needs to be fixed ASAP
channel.description:
Okay, so I was editing the permissions of some commands yesterday, and I compiled fine and everything, but now, commands like ::giveadmin, ::giveowner, ::demote, :: xteleto, and stuff like that are available to everyone... So basically anyone in the whole server can do all of the admin commands. Also, if I try to do any commands on my main owner account, the runserver.bat says that there was an error parsing and it DC's the entire server.
Obviously this is extremely bad, and I need help ASAP.
Any ideas?

item.title: 317 Delta. Critical command problem. Needs to be fixed ASAP
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:15, topic:393905”]You have a space between ::demote and the username?
Well the substring(8) covers that space, the substring(7) didn’t.[/quote]

That didn’t fix it. I still get the error in my runserver.bat that says “Exception encountered while receiving incoming packets from Strauss” (Strauss is my username), and it disconnects me when I do a command.

Edit: I forgot to say, it executes the command, it just disconnects everyone.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 Delta. Critical command problem. Needs to be fixed ASAP

item.title: 317 Delta. Critical command problem. Needs to be fixed ASAP
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("demote")) { try { String playerToDemote = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToDemote)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been demoted by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 0; c2.logout(); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

May have to change it a little for delta.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 Delta. Critical command problem. Needs to be fixed ASAP

item.title: 317 Delta. Critical command problem. Needs to be fixed ASAP
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Alright. I’ll post an example of a command that’s giving me trouble.

if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Strauss")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; savegame(true); c.disconnected = true; } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

I tried it with AND without a semicolon after the

Read full topic
